channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adobe’s CFO: Agentic AI is a ‘natural evolution’ for the company
item.description: Dan Durn explains why 2025 is the year AI will be a game-changer for companies.

item.title: How a smaller government real-estate footprint under Trump could boost cities
Jamie Dimon said people should get over tariffs. On $39 million, he can.
Trump staff are reportedly ‘furious’ with Elon Musk after he publicly trashed the Trump-backed $500 billion AI project
item.description: Trump staffers are reportedly angry with Elon Musk.

item.title: French military police rescue co-founder of €1.3bn crypto startup Ledger after bungled Paris kidnapping goes wrong
item.description: Police made 10 arrests after David Balland and his wife were kidnapped over demands for a crypto ransom.

item.title: Ericsson shares skid as enterprise trouble offsets AT&T boost
Jamie Dimon gets a $3 million pay rise for 2024 bringing his compensation to $39 million
item.description: Dimon was benchmarked not only on the performance of the Wall Street giant, but the board's options for his successor.

item.title: Ford is recalling more than 270,000 Broncos and Mavericks over a power problem that can cause them to stop unexpectedly
item.description: Information from the National Highway and Transportation Safety Administration says the problem is related to a 12 volt battery made by Camel Battery ...

item.title: Texas Instruments finally sees growth on the horizon, but it’s a slow recovery
Europe's economy improves in Jan, but is overshadowed by Trump's tariff threat
